lead_paragraph: Also, the Art Dealers Association of America’s art show, which begins on Wednesday, will feature works by Kirchner and early selfies by Gillian Wearing.

headline.print_headline: Philadelphia Museum of Art Finally Gets a Hopper
headline.main: Philadelphia Museum of Art Finally Gets a Hopper

snippet: Also, the Art Dealers Association of America’s art show, which begins on Wednesday, will feature works by Kirchner and early selfies by Gillian Wearing.
abstract: Robin Pogrebin Inside Art column; estate of Daniel W Dietrich II gifts Philadelphia Museum money and art, including painting by Edward Hopper; Samara Golden creates 18-room art installation at San Francisco's Yerba Buena Center for the Arts; Galerie St Etienne will display retrospective of works by German Expressionist Ernst Ludwig Kirchner; Tanya Bonakdar gallery will feature self-portraits by Gillian Wearing at March show in Park Avenue Armory; Edward Tyler Nahem Fine Art gallery plans May exhibit of Ed Ruscha drawings.
